allow: Bash(wsl -d Ubuntu -- bash -c "source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && cd ~/openclaw && nohup node dist/entry.js gateway run --bind loopback --port 18789 > /tmp/openclaw.log 2>&1 & echo \\$!":*)

Bash(ssh cambium-server-tunnel "powershell -Command ""Start-Process syncthing -WindowStyle Hidden; Start-Sleep 5; Get-Content $env:LOCALAPPDATA\\Syncthing\\config.xml | Select-String ''device id''""")
